articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Musan Ore Mining Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Musan Ore Mining Complex
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Musan Ore Mining Complex.
					He went round historic relics and data associated with the giant footsteps of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					The Munsan Mine has turned into a leading large iron ore producer under the wise guidance and meticulous care of the President, he said, adding that the undying revolutionary feats of the President will shine long in the history of the country.
					
					He climbed Cholsan Hill and commanded a bird's-eye view of the mine.
					
					Feasting his eyes on the terraced cutting faces and vast mining areas, he was greatly satisfied to learn that the complex has turned into a huge iron ore producer having modern mining equipment.
					
					Dropping in at cutting faces, he acquainted himself with the operation of equipment and production and warmly encouraged the miners performing heroic feats in the dynamic drive to build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					The workers of the complex are working under the unfavorable natural circumstances all the year round but have won one victory after another, always overcoming all difficulties with patriotic enthusiasm, he said, noting that the shining feats performed in this proud course are a powerful demonstration of the great mental power of the Korean workers who cherish the loyalty to the Party and the leader as their unshakable faith.
					
					The complex is performing a very important duty and role in building an economic power, he said, advancing important tasks to be carried out by the complex.
					
					Noting that the Musan Mine which abounds in iron ore and has favorable conditions for mining is a precious asset for building a rich and powerful nation and a treasure of the country, he stressed the need to turn the mine into a worldwide iron ore producer by developing it under a long-term plan. 
					
					 In order to develop the mine under a long-term plan it is necessary to give priority to prospecting and secure many more reserve mine lots and, at the same time, take concrete measures for cutting based on latest science and technology and dynamically push forward them in a planned manner.
					
					 In order to provide iron works with more quality concentrated ores, the complex should continue to thoroughly implement the Party's policy of mass ore cutting and carriage, he said, stressing that to this end it is necessary to complete the technological updating and the project for expanding the capacity such as the installment of large-size rotary crushers in a brief span of time.
					
					 He also underlined the need for the complex to increase the rate of operation of excavators, sinker drills, trucks and all other mining machines and transporting equipment so as to keep the production of iron ore going at a high rate. 
					
					 He called on the complex to introduce new technology to steadily boost the efficiency of all machines and equipment to give fullest play to its huge production potential and live up to the Party's expectation and trust in it.  
					
					 He stressed that the complex should continue to pay a deep attention to the supply service. 
					
					 The officials of the complex should increase the supply of non-staple food to the miners who are devoting themselves to the Party and the revolution, always bearing in mind the President's teaching that supply service precisely means a political work, and provide them with better living conditions including dwelling houses, he noted.
					
					 He expressed the expectation and belief that the workers of the complex would perform their duty as part of the working class in the future, too as befitting a vanguard unit which has taken the lead in carrying out the cause of the Party and thus display the heroic stamina and mettle to win sure victory once again in the general offensive to open the gate to a thriving nation.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hong Sok Hyong, chief secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Lists of Voters Displayed
articles.content:
Lists of Voters Displayed
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Lists of voters were displayed at constituencies and sub-constituencies for the forthcoming election of deputies to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					The lists were drawn up under the regulations related to the application of the DPRK Law on Elections of Deputies to the People's Assemblies at All Levels.
					
					 Registered in the lists were all citizens residing in relevant areas who have the right to vote.

articles.title: National Meeting of Activists of Agricultural Field Held
articles.content:
National Meeting of Activists of Agricultural Field Held
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- A national meeting of activists in the agricultural field took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday.
					Present there were Kim Yong Il, Choe Thae Bok and leading officials of party and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials of model farms and agricultural workers.
					
					The participants listened to the recorded speech "Let Us Fully Apply the Juche Method of Farming to Bring about a New Upsurge in Agricultural Production" made by President Kim Il Sung at the National Agricultural Conference, on January 27, Juche 67 (1978).
					
					A report was delivered by Minister of Agriculture Kim Chang Sik at the meeting to be followed by speeches.
					
					The reporter and speakers referred to the fact that Kim Il Sung made public his work "Theses on the Socialist Rural Question in Our Country" on February 25, Juche 53 (1964), unrolling a brilliant blueprint for building socialist countryside and bringing about a change in the nation's agricultural development.
					
					They said that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has attached great importance to the work for solving the problem of the people's food scarcity, the problem of food, adding that he set forth the policies for agricultural revolution including the policies of improving the seed, doing double cropping and boosting potato and soya bean output, busy as he was with providing Songun leadership, and has energetically led the drive for implementing them.
					
					 They called on all the officials and the agricultural workers to bring about great innovations and leaps forward in the agricultural production under the banner of Songun and thus positively contribute to the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Top Leaders of China
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Top Leaders of China
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly Kim Yong Nam and Premier Kim Yong Il of the DPRK sent a message of sympathy to President Hu Jintao and Premier of the State Council Wen Jiabao of China on Monday as regards the gas explosion in a coal mine in Shanxi Province, China, that caused heavy casualties.
					 Extending deep sympathy and consolation to the president and the premier of China and, through them, to the Chinese government and people and the victims and their bereaved families, the message heartily hoped that the people in the afflicted area would eradicate the aftermath of the disaster and lead a stabilized life as soon as possible under the leadership of the Communist Party and government of China.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Dominican President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Dominican President
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Monday sent a message of sympathy to Leonel Fernandez Reyna, President of the Republic of Dominica, in connection with the recent torrential rain that hit the Northeastern part of Dominica, claiming huge human and material losses.
					 Kim in the message expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the president and, through him, to the people in the afflicted area and hoped that the Dominican government and people would eradicate the aftermath of the natural disaster as early as possible.

articles.title: Greetings to Sultan of Brunei
articles.content:
Greetings to Sultan of Brunei
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Haji Hassanal Bolkiah, Sultan of Brunei Darussalam, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message wished the sultan good health and happiness and the country progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Delegation of Vietnam Women's Union Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Vietnam Women's Union Arrives
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Vietnam Women's Union headed by Nguyen Thi Thanh Hoa, president of its Central Committee, arrived here by air on Monday.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Peruvian Figures
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Peruvian Figures
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with gifts by Felix Fernandes Torres, secretary general of the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, and Yuri Castro Romero, secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, on the occasion of his birthday.
					They were handed to the charge d'affaires ad interim of the DPRK embassy in Peru by Felix Fernandes Torres and Yuri Castro Romero on Feb. 18.

articles.title: Russian Diplomats Here Mark Day of Defenders of Motherland
articles.content:
Russian Diplomats Here Mark Day of Defenders of Motherland
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Russian embassy here laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on Monday on the occasion of the Day of Defenders of Motherland.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Ambassador Valery Sukhinin, Military Attache Alexei Bartusov and other staff members of the Russian embassy and the Military Attaches Corps here.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to the memory of the fallen soldiers of the Soviet army after placing the wreath in the name of the Russian embassy.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy also laid a wreath and bouquets before the cemetery of the fallen soldiers of the Soviet army in Sadong District, Pyongyang on the same day.

articles.title: Historical and Cultural Relics Well Preserved in DPRK
articles.content:
Historical and Cultural Relics Well Preserved in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Much effort is channeled to the excavation, arrangement and permanent preservation of historical and cultural relics in the DPRK.
					In recent years lots of historical and cultural relics have been unearthed in different areas and historical remains restored to their original state and well arranged and their surroundings refurnished.
					
					In Pyongyang the red-and-blue painting of the Taedong Gate, the Chongryu Pavilion, the Ulmil Pavilion and other historical monuments have been renewed and their walls and floors repaired, Taesongsan Fort has been repaired and the Paek Son Haeng Memorial Hall and the Monument to Kye Wol Hyang have been spruced up.
					
					In North Hwanghae Province, one thousand and several hundred meter sections of the walls on Mt. Jongbang, Hwangju-township and other places have been restored to their original state and ditches around scores of historical monuments including the Simwon Temple in Yonthan County and Kwijin Temple in Sohung County have been rearranged to be protected from floods.
					
					In South Phyongan Province the pillars and large beams of the Anguk Temple built in 503 have been repaired to restore their original looks. The red-and-blue painting of the Paeksang Pavilion in Anju City has been renewed and the grave of those buried alive with the dead in Songchon County and the house of the famous patriotic general Kim Ung So in Ryonggang County have been repaired.
					
					The Ryongthong Temple in Kaesong, the capital of Koryo (918-1392), has been restored and the repair of the Haeju Puyong Pavilion and the Pyoksong Sohyon Lecture Hall in South Hwanghae Province, the Ryangchon Temple, the Anbul Temple, the Ryonghung Temple and the Kathu Temple in South Hamgyong Province has been successfully completed.
					
					The historical and cultural relics across the country are shining as precious treasures of the nation under the correct cultural preservation policy of the DPRK.

articles.title: Scientific and Technological Knowledge to Be Disseminated
articles.content:
Scientific and Technological Knowledge to Be Disseminated
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Activities for disseminating scientific and technological knowledge will take place more briskly than ever before in the DPRK which is striving to effect a new revolutionary upsurge.
					It is planned to hold various forms of events including scientific and technological presentation and show, symposium, short course under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					
					A national symposium on hypothesis and conception, a national nano scientific and technological presentation and nano products exhibition, the 5th National Academic Symposium on Kyongrak, a national technological short course in the field of mushroom production and a scientific and technological symposium on earthquake and volcano will be held and departmental scientific and technological activities will take place in main units.
					
					Especially a scientific and technological presentation and an on-the-spot technological consultation in the metal industry sector are drawing attention to share with each other the scientific and technological achievements made in modernizing the Juche iron production processes and decisively increasing its production and the valuable successes and experiences made in the work of giving priority to the development of the metal industry. 
					
					It has been also planned to convene scientific and technological presentation and technological consultation in the fields of electric power and coal industries so as to make a positive contribution to putting the thermal power plants on full capacity operation, operate the hydro-power stations under construction as early as possible and remarkably increasing the coal output.
					
					Preparations are being made for scientific and technological presentations in the sectors of agriculture, fisheries, light industry and city management and for a swift development of cutting-edge science and technology and basic science. Technological short courses and activities for widely generalizing successes and experiences in various sectors of the national economy are under preparation.
					
					This year the associations and scientific societies under the federation are preparing scientific and technological knowledge dissemination activities on a higher level than ever before.
					
					The planned scientific and technological knowledge dissemination activities will be contribute positively to backing up in a scientific and technological way the efforts of the Korean people for creating a general advance speed in the Songun era.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Policy of Confrontation with DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Policy of Confrontation with DPRK Slammed
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group's policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen is bound to go bankrupt as it swims against the trend of the times.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this is a signed article.
					
					Citing facts to prove that the Lee group has persistently pursued an anachronistic policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen quite contrary to the unanimous will and desire of the Koreans, utterly indifferent to the destiny of the country and the nation, hell-bent on sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with compatriots, the article goes on:
					
					 The Lee group has pushed the inter-Korean relations to the phase of total collapse and drove the situation to the brink of a war during the first year of its office. This is a thrice-cursed crime against the nation. 
					
					 The above-said acts perpetrated by the group were so reckless that they put the successive fascist dictators of south Korea into the shade.
					
					 The Lee group is now in the grip of the daily worsening politico-economic crisis.
					
					Nobody else except the group is to blame for this crisis. It is an inevitable consequence of the policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen pursued by the group of traitors, blatantly challenging the ardent desire of the Koreans for independent reunification, backed by outside forces.
					
					Much upset by this, the Lee group is making desperate efforts to evade the responsibility for bedeviling the inter-Korean relations at any cost, far from drawing a lesson from the above-said policy failure and making a policy switchover.
					
					This group can never be the DPRK's dialogue partner as it has persistently escalated the confrontation, not feeling any guilty conscience, utterly indifferent to the fate of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					The political charlatans forsaken by the nation should never be allowed to quell the desire and wishes of the fellow countrymen. No force can stop the advance of the times toward independent reunification.
					
					Only a stern judgment by history awaits the Lee group as it has driven the inter-Korean relations to total confrontation while going against the trend of the June 15 era of reunification.

articles.title: Songun Politics Described as Powerful Weapon for Victory of Socialism
articles.content:
Songun Politics Described as Powerful Weapon for Victory of Socialism
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea serves as the politics for defending socialism and peace.
					 Rodong Sinmun today stresses this in a signed article.
					
					Only when the banner of Songun is held high, is it possible to protect the dignity of the country and the nation and defend and ensure the world peace and security, the article says, and continues:
					
					Toward the close of the last century, socialism collapsed in some countries and the anti-socialist hurricane swept over the world. Even under such severe political tempest, the DPRK uplifted the red flag of socialism, adhering to the fundamental interests and principles of revolution without any concession and the slightest deviation. And it decisively frustrated the anti-DPRK moves of the imperialist allied forces getting evermore pronounced in the new century and remarkably enhanced the prestige of the country and the dignity of the nation. This striking reality would have been unthinkable without General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the illustrious commander who clarified the philosophy on army that the revolution is pioneered, advanced and accomplished with arms and built up the invincible revolutionary armed forces by attaching importance to the arms and military affairs.
					
					Military clashes have been prevented on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and another Korean war has not broken out so far. It is because socialism of the DPRK has been defended by Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership and Songun politics.
					
					The Korean people contained the U.S. imperialists' offensive against the DPRK, thus reducing the U.S. policy of aggression on it to collapse.
					
					The failure of the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK is leading to the total bankruptcy of the international political order centered on the U.S.
					
					The trend of the times is swimming towards the multi-polar world despite of the U.S. moves to build a unipolar world.
					
					 A signal turn is being brought in accomplishing the global cause of socialism.
					
					 The DPRK has made great changes in all fields of politics, military affairs, economy and culture in the crucible of struggle to defend socialism. 
					
					 Socialist Korea, which is demonstrating its might while winning victory by dint of Songun politics, has become the beacon of hope and the banner of victory for the world peoples aspiring after independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Leadership Feats Praised in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Leadership Feats Praised in Democratic Congo
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo, made public a statement on Feb. 18 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					The statement noted that Kim Jong Il performed great feats in the course of further glorifying socialist Korea centred on the popular masses. Thanks to his wise guidance the position of socialist Korea has been raised beyond comparison, it added.
					
					It stressed that the revolutionary cause of Juche is being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il who is faithful to the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					Noting that the Korean people are holding high the banner of socialism invariably despite the persistent moves of the U.S. imperialists to stifle the DPRK and their military threat to it, it said that this is unthinkable apart from the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.
					
					The signal achievements being made by the Korean people in political, economic, cultural and all other fields at present are a great encouragement to the world progressive humankind aspiring after socialism, the statement said, stressing that the cause of global independence is sure to be realized thanks to Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK's February Holiday Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's February Holiday Celebrated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Meetings, film shows and book and photo exhibitions took place in Peru, Italy, Thailand and Myanmar between Feb. 8 and 12 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venues of events were famous works of the peerlessly great persons and photos showing their undying feats and books and photos introducing the Korean people in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieve the reunification of the country.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					The chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru said that though there were turns and twists in which socialism collapsed and capitalism revived in some countries, socialism has been further strengthened in the DPRK led by Kim Jong Il and the DPRK has risen up as a socialist fortress, shedding its rays all over the world.
					
					The general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy referred to the fact that
						Kim Jong Il has developed and enriched the Juche idea, the Songun idea and turned the DPRK into a powerful country remaining unfazed to any aggressive moves of the imperialists with his Songun politics and to the essence and vitality of the Songun politics.
					
					Appreciated at the film shows were Korean films showing the Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Myanmar.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Lectures were held in Tajikistan, Democratic Congo and Zambia and round-table talks in Brazil and Tunisia between Feb. 10 and 14 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The secretary in charge of the ideological work of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Tajikistan in a lecture said that Kim Jong Il put forward the army as the main force and established the mode of the unique Songun politics to defend the country, the revolution and socialism and push ahead with the overall socialist construction by relying on it in the 1990s when the moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK were at their height.
					
					He noted that Kim Jong Il has attached priority to strengthening the military power, regarding the military affairs as the most important national affairs and the military power as the most important national strength in the struggle to defend socialism.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea of Democratic Congo in a lecture noted that while inspecting units of the Korean People's Army, Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il has made sure that all the servicepersons were fully prepared in political, ideological and military technical aspects and taken warm care of their military service and living as their parents would do.
					
					 It is no accident that the KPA servicepersons are replete with the resolution to devotedly fight for the sake of their supreme commander while remaining absolutely true to his idea and leadership, he said.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Brazilian Workers' Party said at the round-table talks that the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il is the most just political mode for defending the sovereignty of the country under the present complicated international situation and its validity and vitality are fully displayed in the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Pakistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Pakistan
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "Songun Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner for Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Victorial Publishing House of Pakistan.
					The work published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003) clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is the powerful political mode of the present era which inherited and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to the arms and the scientific revolutionary line and political mode which most correctly reflected the requirements of the era and the revolution, and the validity, advantages and great vitality of the Songun politics.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno el complejo 7 de Julio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno el complejo 7 de Julio
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo 7 de Julio.
					Primeramente, el Dirigente recorrio el museo de la historia revolucionaria y la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					El recordo con gran emocion la gloriosa trayectoria de desarrollo de la fabrica que recorrio el unico camino de victoria y prosperidad bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y enseno que gracias a la sabia direccion y el cuidado minucioso del Presidente el complejo se convirtio en la confiable base de produccion quimica de gran tamano del pais.
					
					Prosiguio que sus inmortales hazanas brillaran eternamente en los anales de la patria.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente recorrio varios procesos de produccion para enterarse del estado de reconstruccion tecnica y de produccion.
					
					Tras ver los nuevos procesos de produccion que se irguieron grandiosamente, dijo que el aspecto del complejo estaba tan cambiado que no lo reconoce y se mostro muy satisfecho de que el complejo levanto magnificamente la gran creacion de autoconfianza que reflejo suficientemente la demanda de la epoca de la industria  de informatica.
					
					Indico que en los ultimos anos este complejo invento decenas de nuevas tecnicas valiosas y las introdujo en la produccion con lo cual aumento rapidamente la produccion de principales productos quimicos y anadio que este exito asombroso es el precioso fruto de la potencia espiritual de los obreros revolucionarios de nuestra epoca dispuesta del colectivismo con que dedican toda su inteligencia y entusiasmo para el desarrollo de la patria e intereses de la sociedad y la comunidad.
					
					 El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan ante la fabrica.
					
					 Subrayo que para producir y suministrar gran cantidad de varios productos quimicos es necesario promover de continuo la reconstruccion tecnica para dotar todos los procesos de produccion del complejo con los equipos ultramodernos y fortalecer la lucha por introducir nuevas tecnicas conforme a la demanda de la idea del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de dar prioridad a la ciencia.
					
					Dijo que es muy bueno el que los obreros y tecnicos del complejo fortalecieron el espiritu Juche de la industria quimica al establecer el sistema de produccion basado en las materias primas y materiales domesticos y librar persistentemente la investigacion cientifica para disminuir la norma de consumo de materiales por unidad de produccion y recalco que en el futuro tambien deben prestar profunda atencion al respecto. 
					
					Indico que los funcionarios directivos del complejo deben hacer minuciosamente  la labor de organizacion economica para movilizar la facultad creadora de los productores, por una parte y por la otra, deben fortalecer la lucha por el  ahorro  al anteponer el calculo  economico y asegurar cabalmente la utilidad real en la produccion.
					
					 El Dirigente destaco que las organizaciones del partido y de masas del complejo deben librar bien la labor organizativa y politica conforme al entusiasmo de  lucha de los obreros del complejo, y al mismo tiempo, hacer bien el trabajo de servicio de abastecimiento para los obreros.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Norte Hong Sok Hyong, el secretario del CC del PTC Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek  y el primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC Ju Kyu Chang.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion artistica de militares
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion artistica de militares
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion del grupo de propaganda artistica de la gran unidad combinada No. 264 del EPC.
					Los ejecutantes pusieron en la escena el solo femenino y el pangchang "Arirang entre el ejercito y el pueblo", el solo femenino "Empezamos sobre las ruinas", el coro "Defenderemos a riesgo de la vida la Direccion de la Revolucion" y otras piezas.
					
					 Mediante su funcion ellos mostraron bien el invencible poderio del EPC, la ferrea conviccion y la voluntad de los militares del EPC de defender a ultranza la Direccion de la Revolucion y llevar a feliz termino con las fuerzas armadas la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo al estimado General.
					
					 Tambien, demostraron claramente el poderio de los artistas militares que cumplen excelentemente su sagrada mision como el corneta de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) de sembrar el ardiente amor al partido, el lider, la patria y el pueblo en el corazon de los militares.
					
					 El Dirigente se mostro gran satisfecho de que los integrantes del grupo de propaganda artistica de la unidad crearon las excelente obras que reflejan patentemente la infinita potencia espiritual de los militares coreanos y ofrecieron  la funcion sincera y combativa.
					
					En particular, les dio agradecimiento evaluando altamente que es la mas excelente funcion, valerosa en lo artistico y educativo de entre las representaciones de los grupos de propaganda artistica efectuadas recientemente.
					
					 Presento las tareas que sirven de guia para fortalecer las revolucionarias y combativas actividades de propaganda artistica.
					
					 Vieronla tambien el secretario del CC del PTC Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC Jang Song Thaek y Pak Nam Gi y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC, generales y oficiales del EPC.

articles.title: Publicadas listas de electors
articles.content:
Publicadas listas de electores
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ATCC) -- En visperas de las elecciones de los diputados a la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, todos los comites electorales de distritos y subdistritos publicaron las listas de electores.
					Estas nominas fueron elaboradas en virtud del reglamento de ejecucion de la ley de las elecciones de diputados a las asambleas populares a todos los niveles de la RPDC.
					
					En ellas fueron registrados todos los ciudadanos residentes en las respectivas zonas, que tienen el derecho al voto.

articles.title: Reunion nacional de los activistas de sector agricola
articles.content:
Reunion nacional de los activistas de sector agricola
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 23 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la reunion nacional de los activistas del sector agricola.
					En el acto participaron Kim Yong Il y Choe Thae Bok, los funcionarios directivos de los organos del partido, el poder, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los destacados funcionarios de las granjas y trabajadores agricolas de distintos lugares del pais.
					
					Los participantes escucharon la voz grabada-discurso del Presidente Kim Il Sung "Registremos un nuevo ascenso en la produccion agricola mediante la plena aplicacion del metodo de cultivo jucheano", pronunciado el 27 de enero del 67 (1978) de la Era Juche en la Conferencia Nacional Agricola.
					
					 En la reunion hubo el informe del ministro de Agricultura Kim Chang Sik e intervenciones. 
					
					 Los oradores senalaron que el Presidente Kim Il Sung, al publicar el 25 de febrero del 53 (1964) de la Era Juche la obra "Tesis sobre el problema rural socialista en nuestro pais", hizo  dar el gran proyecto de la construccion rural socialista y producir un viraje en el desarrollo agricola del pais.
					
					 Destacaron que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, al atribuir la gran importancia a la labor para resolver el problema de alimentos, el de comida de los habitantes, presento, aunque estaba tan ocupado por la direccion de Songun (priorizacion militar), la orientacion de la revolucion de semillas, la del cultivo de doble cosecha, la de la revolucion en el cultivo de patatas, la de cultivo de soyas y otras y condujo energicamente la lucha por llevarlas a cabo.
					
					Todos los funcionarios y trabajadores agricolas deben producir una gran innovacion y un gran auge en la produccion agricola y hacer un gran aporte a la construccion de una gran potencia prospera enarbolando la bandera del Songun, recalcaron los oradores.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam y Kim Yong Il envian telegrama a sus homologos chinos
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam y Kim Yong Il envian telegrama a sus homologos chinos
 Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, y el premier del Consejo de Ministros, Kim Yong Il, enviaron el dia 23 un telegrama de consuelo al presidente de la Republica Popular China Hu Jintao y el premier del Consejo de Estado Wen Jiabao  en relacion con que ocurrio una gran  perdida humana debido al accidente de explosion de gas en una mina carbonifera de la provincia de Shanxi de China.
					 Los remitentes envian profundas condolencias y consuelo a los destinatarios y por  su conducto, al gobierno y el pueblo de China, las victimas y sus familiares, y les desean de todo corazon que bajo la direccion del Partido Comunista de China y el gobierno chino los habitantes damnificados  eliminen cuanto antes las consecuencias de danos y disfruten de la vida estabilizada.
